item.title: Forget Your Desktop: The Philosophy of My Minimalist Arch + Sway System
item.author: muratkurkoglu@gmail.com (Murat Kurkoglu)
item.description: Journey from a bloated desktop user to the architect of a minimalist Arch Linux and Sway system. Discover the philosophy of taking back control.
